dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: MRI relaxation time constant maps
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Zipped folder containing MRI relaxation time constant maps. Files are meant to be opened and analyzed using the Aedes toolbox for MATLAB. See the publication in PLOS ONE for more details. Files are titled "MRI _[mouse identifier]_[MRI sequence].t1r [or .t1]". Mice 13021, 13224, 13255, N3, N4, and N5 are mice with MPS I; mice 13257, 13258, N1, N2, and N6 are heterozygotes.
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: myelin
dysmyelination
MRI
mucopolysaccharidosis
